name: Waver (Vukbo)
description:
Waver is a shooter with focus on cooperative play. You can't heal yourself, let other player help you!

Controls
Player 01 - KEYBOARD
W,A,S,D - to move
SPACE  - to jump
R - to reload
F - to revive other player
LEFT CLICK - to shoot bullet
RIGHT CLICK - to shoot heal

Player 02 - CONTROLLER
D-PAD - to move
A - to jump
X - to reload
Y - to revive other player
RT - to shoot bullet
LT - to shoot heal
